mapper.insert: insert into caracteristiques_economiques_entreprise (nature_juridique, lib_nature_juridique, activite_principale, lib_activite_principale, annee_validite_activite_principale, activite_principale_registre_metier) values (#{nature_juridique}, #{lib_nature_juridique}, #{activite_principale}, #{lib_activite_principale}, #{annee_validite_activite_principale}, #{activite_principale_registre_metier})
mapper.update: update caracteristiques_economiques_entreprise set lib_nature_juridique = #{nature_juridique}, lib_nature_juridique = #{lib_nature_juridique}, activite_principale = #{activite_principale}, lib_activite_principale = #{lib_activite_principale}, annee_validite_activite_principale = #{annee_validite_activite_principale}, activite_principale_registre_metier = #{activite_principale_registre_metier} where id = #{id}
